amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit funding in this Act for drag shows, drag queen story hours, and similar events.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
